SQL Mode for CodeMirror

MIME entityypes defined: entityexentity/x-sql, entityexentity/x-mysql, entityexentity/x-mariadb, entityexentity/x-cassandra, entityexentity/x-plsql, entityexentity/x-mssql, entityexentity/x-hive.
